dashboard_description: Leverage NASA's satellite data to make informed decisions, improve crop yield, and practice sustainable agriculture. Manage your farms, analyze data, and view detailed reports all in one place.
dashboard_farms: View, add, or edit your farm plots.
dashboard_decisions: Get AI-powered planting and irrigation advice.
dashboard_reports: Analyze yield history and soil data.
rent_farm_machinery: Rent farm machinery from local owners in Ghaziabad region
